metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28851 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description:
In x/text in Go 1.15.4, an "index out of range" panic occurs in language.ParseAcceptLanguage while parsing the -u- extension. (x/text/language is supposed to be able to parse an HTTP Accept-Language header.)

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28851` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-golang-x-text-dev - 0.3.6-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: alexmurray> google-guest-agent contains a vendored copy of golang-golang-x-text

criterions.comment: golang-golang-x-text package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.6-1').
